authCodeFlowSlide.description.translation: Vastaanottaaksesi tämän kortin sinun tulee valtuuttaa tilisi. Sinut ohjataan nyt myöntäjän verkkosivulle.

comments: Heading shown when user is about to authenticate

cardLifecycle.active.sheetDescription.message: Your credentials may expire or require an active internet connection to validate.
cardLifecycle.active.sheetDescription.translation: Valtuutuksesi voivat vanhentua tai vaatia aktiivisen internetyhteyden vahvistamiseen.

cardLifecycle.batch.sheetDescription.message: This card requires periodic validation using an internet connection. When usage is low you will be notified.
cardLifecycle.batch.sheetDescription.translation: Tämä kortti vaatii säännöllistä vahvistusta internetyhteydellä. Kun käyttö on vähäistä, saat ilmoituksen.

cardLifecycle.limitedByDate.active.sheet.message: Some credentials may expire or require an active internet connection to validate
cardLifecycle.limitedByDate.active.sheet.translation: Jotkut valtuutukset voivat vanhentua tai vaatia internetyhteyden vahvistamiseen

cardLifecycle.limitedByDate.activeIn.message: This card will be active in {activeDaysString}, on {0}.

cardLifecycle.limitedByDate.expired.desc.message: The expiration date of this card has passed

cardLifecycle.limitedByDate.expired.shee.message: The expiration date of this card has passed on {0}.

cardLifecycle.limitedByDate.validityPeri.message: The validity period of this card is from {0} until {1}.

cardLifecycle.revoked.sheetDescription.message: The issuer has revoked this card and it can not be used anymore. Contact the issuer for more information.
cardLifecycle.revoked.sheetDescription.translation: Myöntäjä on peruuttanut tämän kortin eikä sitä voi enää käyttää. Ota yhteyttä myöntäjään saadaksesi lisätietoja.

comments: Confirm button text for archiving a card

common.archiveCardDescription.message: This will make {name} unusable and delete it from your wallet.

common.archiveCardDescription.translation: Tämä tekee kortista {name} käyttökelvottoman ja poistaa sen lompakostasi.

funkeWallet.about.description.message: This app was created by Animo Solutions in the context of the SPRIN-D Funke ‘EUDI Wallet Prototypes’. It serves as a prototype for future wallet providers. All code is available under Apache 2.0.
comments: About screen description text for the Funke wallet
funkeWallet.about.description.translation: Tämän sovelluksen on luonut Animo Solutions SPRIN-D Funke 'EUDI Wallet Prototypes' -hankkeen yhteydessä. Se toimii prototyyppinä tuleville lompakkopalveluntarjoajille. Kaikki koodi on saatavilla Apache 2.0 -lisenssillä.

funkeWallet.about.emailHeader.message: Reach out from Funke EUDI Wallet
comments: Email subject when contacting support from Funke wallet
Status message when the app is fetching credential, presentation, or invitation information. The type is dynamically injected and translated separately

home.receiveOrShare.message: Receive or share from your wallet

inbox.emptyMessage.message: You don't have any notifications at the moment.

inbox.emptyMessage.translation: Sinulla ei ole tällä hetkellä ilmoituksia.

interactionError.message.connect.message: An error occurred while connecting. Generate a new QR-code or try again later.
comments: Error message when connection fails during connect interaction
interactionError.message.connect.translation: Yhdistämisessä tapahtui virhe. Luo uusi QR-koodi tai yritä myöhemmin uudelleen.

interactionError.message.issue.message: An error occurred while fetching the card information. Ask the issuer to generate a new QR-code or try again later.
comments: Error message when credential issuance fails to fetch card info
interactionError.message.issue.translation: Kortin tietojen hakemisessa tapahtui virhe. Pyydä myöntäjää luomaan uusi QR-koodi tai yritä myöhemmin uudelleen.

interactionError.message.sign.message: An error occurred while signing with your card information. Ask the verifier to generate a new QR-code or try again later.
comments: Error message when signing fails with selected credentials
interactionError.message.sign.translation: Kortin tiedoilla allekirjoittamisessa tapahtui virhe. Pyydä tarkastajaa luomaan uusi QR-koodi tai yritä myöhemmin uudelleen.

interactionError.message.verify.message: An error occurred while sharing the card information. Ask the verifier to generate a new QR-code or try again later.
comments: Error message when sharing a credential for verification fails
interactionError.message.verify.translation: Kortin tietojen jakamisessa tapahtui virhe. Pyydä tarkastajaa luomaan uusi QR-koodi tai yritä myöhemmin uudelleen.

comments: Label before displaying a backend or internal error message
Shown while waiting for data to be received from backend
Shown while loading request data from the issuer or verifier

localAi.confirm.description1.message: This will download a local AI model to your device which will take up to around 1.3GB of space.
comments: First paragraph of confirmation sheet explaining model size
localAi.confirm.description1.translation: Tämä lataa paikallisen tekoälymallin laitteeseesi, joka vie noin 1,3 GB tilaa.

localAi.confirm.description2.message: This is an experimental feature. Only supported on high-end devices.
comments: Second paragraph of confirmation sheet warning about device compatibility
localAi.confirm.description2.translation: Tämä on kokeellinen ominaisuus. Tuettu vain tehokkaissa laitteissa.

comments: Title of the confirmation dialog before activating the local model

offlineQr.permissionSettingsDescription.message: Sharing with QR-Code needs access to Bluetooth and Location.

offlineQr.permissionSettingsDescription.translation: QR-koodilla jakaminen tarvitsee Bluetooth- ja sijaintikäyttöoikeuden.

offlineQr.permissionSettingsTitle.message: Please enable required permissions in your phone settings
comments: This is a heading in a system alert that asks the user to go to Settings to enable Bluetooth/Location permissions
offlineQr.permissionSettingsTitle.translation: Ota käyttöön tarvittavat luvat puhelimen asetuksista

onboarding.biometrics.subtitle.message: Activate the biometrics functionality of your phone to make sure only you can enter your wallet and share data.
comments: Subtitle explaining purpose of biometrics
onboarding.biometrics.subtitle.translation: Ota käyttöön puhelimesi biometriset toiminnot varmistaaksesi, että vain sinä pääset lompakkoosi ja voit jakaa tietoja.

comments: Heading when user sets up biometrics

onboarding.intro.subtitle.message: Before you can use the app, we will guide you through these steps.
comments: Subtitle for the introduction steps slide in onboarding
onboarding.intro.subtitle.translation: Ennen kuin voit käyttää sovellusta, opastamme sinut näiden vaiheiden läpi.

comments: Title for the introduction steps slide in onboarding

onboarding.invalidEidPinEntered.message: Invalid PIN entered for eID Card. Please try again

onboarding.pin.subtitle.message: This PIN secures your identity wallet. You enter it every time you share data.
comments: Explanation of the PIN purpose in onboarding
onboarding.pin.subtitle.translation: Tämä PIN-koodi suojaa henkilöllisyyslompakkoasi. Syötät sen aina kun jaat tietoja.

comments: Heading when user chooses a PIN
Heading when user repeats their PIN

onboarding.resetAlert.message.message: Are you sure you want to reset the onboarding process?
comments: Confirmation message for onboarding reset
onboarding.resetAlert.message.translation: Oletko varma, että haluat aloittaa käyttöönoton alusta?

comments: Title of the alert when user attempts to reset onboarding
Button label to open the privacy policy

onboardingDataProtection.toast.cloudHsm.message: Now using Cloud HSM for PID cryptographic keys.
comments: Toast shown when Cloud HSM is selected for key storage
onboardingDataProtection.toast.cloudHsm.translation: PID:n salausavaimissa käytetään nyt pilvipohjaista HSM:ää.

onboardingDataProtection.toast.secureDev.message: Now using {0} for PID cryptographic keys.
comments: Toast shown when switching to local secure storage (e.g. Secure Enclave or Strongbox)

onboardingIdCardRequestedAttributes.desc.message: These {0} attributes will be read from your eID card.
comments: Text explaining how many attributes will be read from the eID card
Button label to allow skipping card setup during onboarding
Button label to begin scanning the ID card using NFC
Button label for unlocking the ID card using biometrics

onboardingIntroduction.reminder.message: You'll need your eID card to setup the wallet
comments: Reminder shown before user continues onboarding
Label for first onboarding step

onboardingIntroduction.step1.description.message: Choose a 6-digit PIN and set up biometrics to secure the wallet.
comments: Description of the first onboarding step about securing the wallet
onboardingIntroduction.step1.description.translation: Valitse 6-numeroinen PIN-koodi ja ota käyttöön biometriikka lompakon suojaamiseksi.

comments: Title of the first onboarding step explaining security setup
Label for second onboarding step

onboardingIntroduction.step2.description.message: Use your ID card PIN to retrieve your identity information.
comments: Description of the second onboarding step about reading identity info
Title of the second onboarding step explaining card scanning
Button label to finish onboarding explanation
Button label to skip wallet explanation slides

onboardingWalletExplanation.slide1.subti.message: Add digital cards with your information, and  share them easily with others. It’s like having your wallet on your phone.
comments: Subtitle for first slide of wallet onboarding
onboardingWalletExplanation.slide1.subti.translation: Lisää digitaalisia kortteja tiedoillasi ja jaa niitä helposti muiden kanssa. Se on kuin lompakko puhelimessasi.

comments: Title for first slide of wallet onboarding

onboardingWalletExplanation.slide2.subti.message: The digital wallet stores your important information all in one place on your phone. It’s a secure and easy way to carry everything you need without using a physical wallet.
comments: Subtitle for second slide of wallet onboarding
onboardingWalletExplanation.slide2.subti.translation: Digitaalinen lompakko tallentaa tärkeät tietosi yhteen paikkaan puhelimeesi. Se on turvallinen ja helppo tapa kantaa kaikkea tarvitsemaasi ilman fyysistä lompakkoa.

comments: Title for second slide of wallet onboarding

onboardingWalletExplanation.slide3.subti.message: Add your cards and documents by scanning QR codes. When organizations request your data, you can review and share with a tap in the app. Your information is always secure with your PIN or fingerprint.
comments: Subtitle for third slide of wallet onboarding
onboardingWalletExplanation.slide3.subti.translation: Lisää korttisi ja asiakirjasi skannaamalla QR-koodeja. Kun organisaatiot pyytävät tietojasi, voit tarkistaa ja jakaa ne yhdellä napautuksella sovelluksessa. Tietosi ovat aina turvassa PIN-koodisi tai sormenjälkesi avulla.

comments: Title for third slide of wallet onboarding

onboardingWelcome.description.message: This is your digital wallet. With it, you can store and share information about yourself.
comments: Intro paragraph on the welcome screen
onboardingWelcome.description.translation: Tämä on digitaalinen lompakkosi. Sen avulla voit tallentaa ja jakaa tietoja itsestäsi.

comments: Button label to begin onboarding from the welcome screen
Option to hide metadata in option sheet
Option to show metadata in option sheet

paradymWallet.about.description.message: This app was created by Animo Solutions as a companion app for Paradym. All code is available under Apache 2.0.
comments: About screen description text for the Paradym wallet
paradymWallet.about.description.translation: Tämän sovelluksen on luonut Animo Solutions Paradymin kumppanisovellukseksi. Kaikki koodi on saatavilla Apache 2.0 -lisenssillä.

comments: Email subject when contacting support from Paradym wallet

pidSetup.dataProtection.subtitle.message: Your data is secured with a PIN and biometrics. Each time you share data, we confirm your identity.
pidSetup.dataProtection.subtitle.translation: Tietosi on suojattu PIN-koodilla ja biometriikalla. Joka kerta kun jaat tietoja, vahvistamme henkilöllisyytesi.

pidSetup.enableBiometrics.subtitle.message: To continue, make sure your device has biometric protection enabled, and that Paradym Wallet is allowed to use biometrics.
pidSetup.enableBiometrics.subtitle.translation: Jatkaaksesi varmista, että laitteessasi on biometrinen suojaus käytössä ja että Paradym Wallet saa käyttää biometriikkaa.

pidSetup.enterPinSubtitle.message: Enter the PIN code you use to unlock your wallet.

pidSetup.idCardComplete.subtitle.message: Your information has been retrieved from your eID card.

pidSetup.idCardPin.subtitle.message: This is required to read data from your card.

pidSetup.idCardScan.subtitle.message: Place your device on top of your eID card to scan it.
pidSetup.idCardScan.subtitle.translation: Aseta laitteesi henkilökortin päälle skannataksesi sen.

pidSetup.idCardVerify.Subtitle.message: We need your biometrics to verify your identity.

pidSetup.stopDescription.message: If you stop, you can still do the setup later.
pidSetup.stopDescription.translation: Jos lopetat, voit tehdä asetukset myöhemmin.

pinLocked.alertMessage.message: Are you sure you want to reset the wallet?
comments: Message body of the confirmation dialog (action button) for wallet reset
pinLocked.alertMessage.translation: Oletko varma, että haluat nollata lompakon?

pinLocked.description.message: You have entered an incorrect PIN. The wallet was locked, please reset it to set a new PIN and continue.
comments: Descriptive text explaining that the wallet is locked and must be reset
pinLocked.description.translation: Olet syöttänyt väärän PIN-koodin. Lompakko lukittiin, nollaa se asettaaksesi uuden PIN-koodin ja jatkaaksesi.

comments: Heading shown when the user has entered too many incorrect PINs

pinSlide.description.message: Use your app PIN code to confirm the request.
comments: Supporting text explaining why PIN is needed

pinSlide.title.message: Send data with your PIN code
comments: Heading shown when user is asked to enter their app PIN to confirm a request

presentationNotification.missingCredenti.message: This credential is not present in your wallet.

presentationNotification.missingRequired.message: You don't have the required credentials to satisfy this request.

presentationNotification.missingRequired.translation: Sinulla ei ole tarvittavia valtuutuksia tämän pyynnön täyttämiseksi.

qrScanner.instructionHeading.message: Use the camera to scan a QR code
comments: Instruction heading for scanning a QR code
Button label to open device settings

qrScanner.permissionDescription.message: This allows the app to scan QR codes that include credentials or data requests.
comments: Description explaining why camera permission is needed
qrScanner.permissionDescription.translation: Tämä mahdollistaa sovelluksen skannata QR-koodeja, jotka sisältävät valtuutuksia tai tietopyyntöjä.

comments: Heading asking user to allow camera permission

receiveCredential.stopDescription.message: If you stop, the card offer will be cancelled.

requestPurpose.infoSheet.description.message: This organization seems to be asking for different or more data than their purpose suggests. Read the request carefully. You can deny the request if you do not agree with the data asked.
comments: Description text in the overasking info sheet
requestPurpose.infoSheet.description.translation: Tämä organisaatio näyttää pyytävän erilaisia tai enemmän tietoja kuin sen tarkoitus antaa ymmärtää. Lue pyyntö huolellisesti. Voit evätä pyynnön, jos et hyväksy pyydettyjä tietoja.

comments: Title of the info sheet that appears when the user taps the warning about overasking

requestPurpose.overaskingWarning.message: The purpose given does not match the data requested.
comments: Warning shown when the declared purpose does not align with the data requested by the organization
requestPurpose.overaskingWarning.translation: Ilmoitettu tarkoitus ei vastaa pyydettyjä tietoja.

comments: Heading above the stated purpose of the data request
Fallback name shown when a credential does not have a display name
Heading above list of attributes shown to the user
Section header title for metadata attributes

requestedAttributes.onlySatisfiedDescrip.message: The following cards will be shared.
comments: Description when the user has all requested cards

requestedAttributes.onlyUnsatisfiedDescr.message: You don't have the requested card(s).
comments: Description when the user has none of the requested cards

requestedAttributes.partialDescription.message: You don't have all of the requested cards.
comments: Description when the user has some but not all requested cards
requestedAttributes.partialDescription.translation: Sinulla ei ole kaikkia pyydettyjä kortteja.

comments: Heading shown above a list of requested cards the user has
Subheading under attribute list: X from Y
Heading shown above a list of requested cards the user does not have

retrieveCredential.cardSuccessfully adde.message: Card successfully added to your wallet!

comments: Label for the toggle to enable developer mode
Header title for the settings screen

sharing.failed.missingCredentials.message: You did not have the required credentials to disclose.
comments: Displayed when the user tries to share but lacks the needed credentials
sharing.failed.missingCredentials.translation: Sinulla ei ollut tarvittavia valtuutuksia jaettavaksi.

comments: Button label for accepting a sign-and-share request
Heading above the signing card

signShare.cardIntro.message: The following personal information will be used to sign the document.
comments: Explains which info will be used to sign
Heading above the document name

signShare.documentIntro.message: The following document will be signed.
comments: Text above the document to be signed

signShare.missingCards.message: You don't have the required cards
comments: Shown when the user lacks the required credentials
Shown under the document name to indicate which QTSP is used for signing
Main heading in the sign & share screen
Explanation that the user is about to sign a document
Heading above the document signing screen
Confirm button text in stop sharing confirmation dialog

slideWizard.confirmation.stopSharingDesc.message: If you stop, no data will be shared.
comments: Description in confirmation dialog about stopping data sharing
Title of confirmation dialog shown when user attempts to stop sharing data

submission.fallbackPurpose.message: No information was provided on the purpose of the data request. Be cautious
comments: Shown when a submission has no stated purpose
submission.fallbackPurpose.translation: Tietopyynnön tarkoituksesta ei annettu tietoa. Ole varovainen

submission.missingCardsWarning.message: You don't have the required cards
comments: Shown when user lacks required credentials

submission.offlineRequestDescription.message: Information about the verifier could not be shown. Carefully consider if you trust this party.
comments: Message shown when the request is offline and verifier is unknown
submission.offlineRequestDescription.translation: Tarkastajan tietoja ei voitu näyttää. Harkitse huolellisesti, luotatko tähän osapuoleen.

comments: Title shown for offline message
Heading shown at the top of the share credentials screen
Button label to accept and share credentials

trust.approvedList.message: A list of organizations that have approved {name}.
comments: A sentence that introduces a list of organizations that approved the current party
trust.approvedList.translation: Lista organisaatioista, jotka ovat hyväksyneet organisaation {name}.

trust.approvedListWithoutOrganizationNam.message: A list of organizations that have approved this unknown organization.
comments: A sentence that introduces a list of organizations that approved the current party, but the organization name is not known
trust.approvedListWithoutOrganizationNam.translation: Lista organisaatioista, jotka ovat hyväksyneet tämän tuntemattoman organisaation.

comments: Label shown after an organization name if it is a demo version
Shown under the name of an organization to indicate that it is a demo
Screen title that describes information about a trusted party or organization

trust.noApprovals.message: There are no organizations that have approved {name}.
comments: A message shown when there are no organizations that approved the current party
trust.noApprovals.translation: Mikään organisaatio ei ole hyväksynyt organisaatiota {name}.

trust.noApprovalsWithoutOrganizationName.message: There are no organizations that have approved this unknown organization.
comments: A message shown when there are no organizations that approved the current party, but the organization name is not known
trust.noApprovalsWithoutOrganizationName.translation: Mikään organisaatio ei ole hyväksynyt tätä tuntematonta organisaatiota.

comments: Subheading for list of organizations that trust the current one

trust.warning.message: Always consider whether sharing with a party is wise.
comments: Shown as a warning box when viewing a trusted party’s detail
trust.warning.translation: Mieti aina tarkkaan, onko tietojen jakaminen järkevää.

comments: Label shown above optional extra description
Label for the input field where the user types the transaction code

txCodeSlide.instructions.message: To receive this card you need to enter a transaction code. This code has been provided to you by the issuer.
comments: Instructions explaining why the user must enter a transaction code
txCodeSlide.instructions.translation: Vastaanottaaksesi tämän kortin sinun tulee syöttää tapahtumakoodi. Myöntäjä on antanut sinulle tämän koodin.

comments: Title prompting the user to enter a transaction code

verifyPartySlide.connectSubtitleUnknownO.message: An unknown organization wants to connect with you.
verifyPartySlide.connectSubtitleUnknownO.translation: Tuntematon organisaatio haluaa muodostaa yhteyden kanssasi.

verifyPartySlide.offerCardSubtitle.message: ${name} wants to offer you a card.

verifyPartySlide.offerCardSubtitleUnknow.message: An unknown organization wants to offer you a card.
verifyPartySlide.offerCardSubtitleUnknow.translation: Tuntematon organisaatio haluaa tarjota sinulle kortin.

verifyPartySlide.requestSubtitle.message: {name} wants to request information from you.

verifyPartySlide.requestSubtitleUnknownO.message: An unknown organization wants to request information from you.
verifyPartySlide.requestSubtitleUnknownO.translation: Tuntematon organisaatio haluaa pyytää sinulta tietoja.

verifyPartySlide.signingSubtitle.message: {name} wants to interact to create a digital signature for a document.

verifyPartySlide.signingSubtitleUnknownO.message: An unknown organization wants to interact to create a digital signature for a document.
verifyPartySlide.signingSubtitleUnknownO.translation: Tuntematon organisaatio haluaa luoda digitaalisen allekirjoituksen asiakirjalle.

welcome.scanAQrCode.message: Scan a QR code to start an interaction.
comments: Subtitle prompting user to scan a QR code
Welcome title in wallet screen
